abstract: United Nations panel monitoring conflict in Syria announces it will share details on suspected criminals with European judicial authorities preparing war crimes cases against them.
lead_paragraph: The panel monitoring the conflict in Syria said it will supply the details to judicial authorities requesting information on those linked to massacres, torture and other abuses in the Syrian civil war.

headline.main: United Nations Panel to Share Details on War Criminals
headline.print_headline: U.N. Panel to Share Details on War Criminals

snippet: The panel monitoring the conflict in Syria said it will supply the details to judicial authorities requesting information on those linked to massacres, torture and other abuses in the Syrian civil war.
